title: taking three days to download patch 6.19
body: my download for the new patch has taken three days and everyday it come up with a error message and have to start all over again what can I do ti speed up and stop the error I have tried the peer to peer transfer.

replies.body:
Peer-to-peer doesn't actually do anything anymore, just as a heads-up. As for the main issue, I recommend working through the steps in our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) as a first step, since we've consolidated the most common fixes there.

Let me know if this issue persists through those steps and if it does, let me know at what percentage it fails at.
